description: Product Management plugin hooks for staleness detection and GitHub sync prompts

hooks.prompt:
Check if this project has PM data that needs attention:

1. Check if `.pm/` directory exists
2. If exists, read `.pm/cache/last-updated.json`
3. Check staleness:
   - If `github_sync` >24 hours ago: Suggest running `/pm:sync`
   - If `competitors` >30 days old: Warn about stale competitor data
   - If `gaps` >14 days old: Note gap analysis may be outdated

If `.pm/` doesn't exist, skip silently (user hasn't started PM workflow).

Only report issues if found. Be concise.
